member.summary: Returns an error message indicating the PLC is not connected.

member.summary: Returns an error message indiciating no data was received on a PLC read.

member.summary: Returns an error message indicating not enough data was received on a PLC read.

The actual amount of bytes from the PLC.

member.summary: Returns an error message indicating too much data was received from a PLC read.

The actual amount of bytes from the PLC.

member.summary: Returns an error message indicating the provided local node was invalid.

member.name: P:PLC_Omron_Standard.Tools.ErrorMessages.InvalidRemoteUdpNode
member.summary: Returns an error message indicating the provided remote node was invalid.

member.summary: Returns an error message indicating the TCP header was invalid.

member.summary: Returns an error message indicating the TCP header was not the corect length.
member.param: The function being requested from the PLC.
The actual amount of bytes from the PLC.

member.summary: Returns an error message indicating writing to the PLC failed.

member.summary: Returns an error message indicating requesting data from the PLC failed.

The actual amount of bytes from the PLC.
